long_description: The LifeProof Bike + Bar mount works with the LifeProof iPhone 5 case (sold separately) to let you keep your iPhone front and center on your next 2-wheeled adventure in any weather. Release latch makes it easy to click your phone in or pull it out of the mount with 1 hand. Light honeycomb construction with premium high-impact materials offers an optimal strength-to-weight ratio. The LifeProof Bike + Bar mount preserves access to buttons, controls and mic; it's adjustable for portrait or landscape orientation and holds the phone facing in or out.
short_description: The LifeProof Bike + Bar mount works with the LifeProof iPhone 5 case (sold separately) to let you keep your iPhone front and center on your next 2-wheeled adventure in any weather.
